query.esql:
FROM aws_billing.cur_latest
| WHERE aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date == DATE_TRUNC(1 month, NOW() - 1 month) AND aws_billing.cur.line_item.type == "Usage"
| STATS sum_line_item_unblended_cost = SUM(aws_billing.cur.line_item.unblended_cost) by aws_billing.cur.line_item.currency_code 
| SORT sum_line_item_unblended_cost DESC
| rename sum_line_item_unblended_cost as `Total Unblended Cost`

params.markdown:
#### AWS Cost and Usage

This dashboard provides insights into the following:

- Total and EC2-specific unblended costs
- Cost breakdown by AWS service and region
- Cost distribution across linked accounts
- Visual trends of usage over time

You can adjust the __time range__ using the filter options to view cost and usage for the current month, last 3 or 6 months, or all time.

query.esql:
FROM aws_billing.cur_latest
| WHERE aws_billing.cur.line_item.type == "Usage" and aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date == DATE_TRUNC(1 month, NOW() - 1 month)
| STATS sum_line_item_unblended_cost = SUM(aws_billing.cur.line_item.unblended_cost) by aws_billing.cur.line_item.product_code, aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date  
| SORT sum_line_item_unblended_cost DESC
| rename sum_line_item_unblended_cost as `Unblended Cost`

FROM aws_billing.cur_latest
| WHERE aws_billing.cur.line_item.type == "Usage" and aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date == DATE_TRUNC(1 month, NOW() - 1 month)

| STATS sum_line_item_unblended_cost = SUM(aws_billing.cur.line_item.unblended_cost) by aws_billing.cur.line_item.usage_account_name, aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date  
| SORT sum_line_item_unblended_cost DESC

FROM aws_billing.cur_latest
| WHERE aws_billing.cur.line_item.type == "Usage" and aws_billing.cur.bill.billing_period_start_date == DATE_TRUNC(1 month, NOW() - 1 month)

| SORT sum_line_item_unblended_cost DESC
| rename sum_line_item_unblended_cost as `Unblended Cost`

| SORT sum_line_item_unblended_cost DESC
| rename sum_line_item_unblended_cost as `Unblended Cost`
